cD_Alpha0.descr: drag coefficient gradient with angle of attack

cD_Mach0.descr: drag coefficient gradient with Mach number

cL0.descr: lift coefficient at nominal flight condition

cL_Alpha0.descr: lift coefficient gradient with angle of attack

cL_Alpha_dot0.descr: lift coefficient gradient with angle of attack rate

cL_Mach0.descr: lift coefficient gradient with Mach number

cL_q0.descr: lift coefficient gradient with pitch angular rate

cL_delta_T.descr: lift coefficient gradient with thrust setting delta_T

cL_delta_E.descr: lift coefficient gradient with elevator deflection delta_E

cm_alpha0.descr: pitching moment coefficient gradient with angle of attack

cm_alpha_dot0.descr: pitching moment coefficient gradient with angle of attack rate

cm_Mach0.descr: pitching moment coefficient gradient with Mach number

cm_q.descr: pitching moment coefficient with respect to q

cm_delta_E.descr: pitching moment coefficient gradient with elevator deflection delta_E

cm_delta_T.descr: pitching moment coefficient gradient with thrust setting delta_T

c_Tfix.descr: thrust coefficient at a fixed point ( U0 = 0 , delta_T = 1 )

k_TV.descr: scale factor of speed effect on thrust coefficient

cY_beta.descr: lateral force coefficient gradient with sideslip angle

cY_p.descr: lateral force coefficient gradient with roll angular rate

cY_r.descr: lateral force coefficient gradient with yaw angular rate

cY_delta_A.descr: lateral force coefficient gradient with aileron deflection delta_A

cY_delta_R.descr: lateral force coefficient gradient with rudder deflection delta_R

cRoll_beta.descr: rolling moment coefficient gradient with sideslip angle

cRoll_p.descr: rolling moment coefficient gradient with roll angular rate

cRoll_r.descr: rolling moment coefficient gradient with yaw angular rate

cRoll_delta_A.descr: rolling moment coefficient gradient with aileron deflection delta_A

cRoll_delta_R.descr: rolling moment coefficient gradient with ruddar deflection delta_R

cYaw_beta.descr: yawing moment coefficient gradient with sideslip angle

cYaw_p.descr: yawing moment coefficient gradient with roll angular rate

cYaw_r.descr: yawing moment coefficient gradient with yaw angular rate

cYaw_delta_A.descr: yawing moment coefficient gradient with aileron deflection delta_A

cYaw_delta_R.descr: yawing moment coefficient gradient with rudder deflection delta_R
